summary: Diff implements About page + routing, a reusable AppLogo component used on sign-in/header/about, admin navigation visibility via isCallerAdmin, an admin invite-tokens page with generation + copy-link + used/unused sections, and baseline PWA manifest/service worker wiring. However, required static image assets (uploaded logo and generated PWA icons) are not evidenced as added, and non-admin access denial for all admin routes (esp. Admin Dashboard) cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the uploaded file "Logo Pasar Digital Community-1.png" as a frontend static asset and ensure it renders on sign-in, onboarding, and in-app header.
missing_requirements.reason: The code references `/assets/Logo Pasar Digital Community-1.png` via `AppLogo`, but the diff summary does not show the actual image file being added to `frontend/public/assets` (or equivalent). Also, no evidence is shown that onboarding page(s) were updated to render the logo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required PWA icon image files (192x192, 512x512, apple-touch 180x180, and maskable 512x512) derived from the provided logo.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and HTML reference icon paths under `/assets/generated/`, but the diff summary does not show these PNG files being added to the repository.

missing_requirements.requirement: When signed in as a non-admin, Admin routes show an access denied screen; Admin Dashboard must be reachable for admins.
missing_requirements.reason: Admin navigation entry visibility is shown in `AppHeader` and AccessDenied is used in `AdminInviteTokensPage`, but the diff does not include `AdminDashboardPage` changes or any evidence that the `/admin` route is gated (or that non-admins see AccessDenied there).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure core layouts (dashboard/admin pages/token tables) are mobile-friendly with no main horizontal overflow and responsive patterns.
missing_requirements.reason: There is evidence of responsive handling in the header and invite-token tables (e.g., overflow-x for tables), but the diff summary does not provide enough evidence for the rest of the primary pages/layouts (dashboard/admin dashboard/etc.) meeting the ~360px usability criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: RSVP submission and RSVP admin listing endpoints added to the backend (`submitRSVP`, `getAllRSVPs`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements focus on branding/logo, admin discoverability, invite-token management, About page, PWA installability, and responsive layouts. RSVP functionality is not requested.
